Build ID: I20061214-1445

Steps To Reproduce:
As a prerequisit, you probably need the workspace set up the same way my workspace is set up, CVS server and all. For what it's worth, I can reproduce this bug by right clicking on a Java file and choosing "Compare With -> History ..."

More information:
